name: Whiskers
description:
Whiskers is a Yume Nikki fangame created in under 2 days for the Dream Diary Jam. It is complete, and there will likely be no future updates beyond bug fixes if any are found.

Play as Raymond from Animal Crossing and explore his shitpost dreams.

  • Whiskers plays like a traditional fangame, however, instead of effects, your goal is to find three maid outfit statues scattered around the dream world. 
  • You enter the dream world through your office chair.
  • You can save anywhere at any time by pressing ESC to bring up the save menu.
  • You can wake up by pressing 1, though there isn't much reason to do so.

The game is very short, only featuring 3 nexus doors, 5 worlds, and one secret area. It can easily be beaten in 5 - 10 minutes.
